E

Empty - Class in square
Class representing empty square of the game board An empty square is defined by this information : name : An empty square can have actions such as : interaction display informations
Empty() - Constructor for class square.Empty
Default empty square constructor.
endGame() - Method in class play.Menu
End of the game.
enemy - package enemy
Enemy classes are used to fight with the perso.
Enemy - Class in square
Class representing enemy of the game board An enemy is defined by those informations : name : life level : attack strength : A enemy can have actions such as : interaction display informations takes a hit gives a hit
Enemy() - Constructor for class square.Enemy
Default enemy constructor.
Enemy(String, int, int) - Constructor for class square.Enemy
Customized enemy constructor.
exception - package exception
Exception classes are used to prevent unwanted action in the game.
